titleStmt.title: The praise of a good name The reproch of an ill name. Wherin euery one may see the fame that followeth laudable actions, and the infamy that cometh by the contrary. With certaine pithy apothegues, very profitable for this age, by C.G.
titleStmt.author: Gibbon, Charles, fl. 1589-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Windet, for Thomas Gosson,

notesStmt.note: Some leaves cropped at head, affecting running title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
